verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%> to Philemon <S%G5371><s%> our beloved <S%G27><s%> [brother] and fellow <S%G4904><s%> worker, <S%G4904><s%>
and to Apphia <S%G682><s%> our sister, <S%G79><s%> and to Archippus <S%G751><s%> our fellow <S%G4961><s%> soldier, <S%G4961><s%> and to the church <S%G1577><s%> in your house: <S%G3624><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> always, <S%G3842><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you in my prayers, <S%G4335><s%>

because I hear <S%G191><s%> of your love, <S%G26><s%> and of the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints; <S%G40><s%>

[and I pray] that the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of your faith <S%G4102><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> effective <S%G1756><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> which is in you for Christ's sake. <S%G1519><s%>

For I have come to have <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and comfort <S%G3874><s%> in your love, <S%G26><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the hearts <S%G4698><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> have been refreshed <S%G373><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> you, brother. <S%G80><s%>
Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> though I have <S%G2192><s%> enough <S%G4183><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> to order <S%G2004><s%> you [to do] that which is proper, <S%G433><s%>

yet for love's sake <S%G1223><s%> I rather <S%G3123><s%> appeal <S%G3870><s%> [to you] – since I am <S%G1510><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a person <S%G5108><s%> as Paul, <S%G3972><s%> the aged, <S%G4246><s%> and now <S%G3570><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> –
I appeal <S%G3870><s%> to you for my child, <S%G5043><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> in my imprisonment, <S%G1199><s%> Onesimus, <S%G3682><s%>
who formerly <S%G4218><s%> was useless <S%G890><s%> to you, but now <S%G3570><s%> is useful <S%G2173><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to you and to me.
And I have sent <S%G375><s%> him back <S%G375><s%> to you in person, <S%G846><s%> that is, [sending] my very heart, <S%G4698><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> I wished <S%G1014><s%> to keep <S%G2722><s%> with me, that in your behalf <S%G5228><s%> he might minister <S%G1247><s%> to me in my imprisonment <S%G1199><s%> for the gospel; <S%G2098><s%>

but without <S%G5565><s%> your consent <S%G1106><s%> I did not want <S%G2309><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> anything, <S%G3762><s%> that your goodness <S%G18><s%> should not be as it were by compulsion, <S%G318><s%> but of your own free <S%G1595><s%> will. <S%G1595><s%>

For perhaps <S%G5029><s%> he was for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> parted <S%G5563><s%> [from you] for a while, <S%G5610><s%> that you should have <S%G568><s%> him back <S%G568><s%> forever, <S%G166><s%>

no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> as a slave, <S%G1401><s%> but more <S%G5228><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> a slave, <S%G1401><s%> a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> to me, but how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> to you, both <S%G2532><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> you regard <S%G2192><s%> me a partner, <S%G2844><s%> accept <S%G4355><s%> him as [you would] me.

But if <S%G1487><s%> he has wronged <S%G91><s%> you in any <S%G5100><s%> way, <S%G5100><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> owes <S%G3784><s%> you anything, <S%G5100><s%> charge <S%G1677><s%> that to my account; <S%G1677><s%>

I, Paul, <S%G3972><s%> am writing <S%G1125><s%> this with my own <S%G1699><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> I will repay <S%G661><s%> it (lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should mention <S%G3004><s%> to you that you owe <S%G4359><s%> to me even <S%G2532><s%> your own <S%G4572><s%> self <S%G4572><s%> as well <S%G4359><s%>).
Yes, <S%G3483><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> let me benefit <S%G3685><s%> from you in the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> refresh <S%G373><s%> my heart <S%G4698><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Having <S%G3982><s%> confidence <S%G3982><s%> in your obedience, <S%G5218><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to you, since I know <S%G3609><s%> that you will do <S%G4160><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> more <S%G5228><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say. <S%G3004><s%>

And at the same <S%G260><s%> time <S%G260><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> prepare <S%G2090><s%> me a lodging; <S%G3578><s%> for I hope <S%G1679><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> your prayers <S%G4335><s%> I shall be given <S%G5483><s%> to you.
Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> my fellow <S%G4869><s%> prisoner <S%G4869><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you,
[as do] Mark, <S%G3138><s%> Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Demas, <S%G1214><s%> Luke, <S%G3065><s%> my fellow <S%G4904><s%> workers. <S%G4904><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with your spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
